name: Auckland
description: Auckland is a bustling city in New Zealand known for its vibrant culture, scenic harbors, and diverse attractions. It's a gateway to stunning natural landscapes.

name: Great Barrier Reef
description: The Great Barrier Reef is the world's largest coral reef system, offering unparalleled snorkeling, diving, and marine biodiversity experiences.

name: Mount Cook
description: Mount Cook, or Aoraki, is the highest mountain in New Zealand and a paradise for climbers, hikers, and photographers.

name: Milford Sound
description: Known as the 'Eighth Wonder of the World,' Milford Sound is a fjord in New Zealand with dramatic cliffs and waterfalls.

name: Paris
description: Paris, the 'City of Light,' is a global hub of art, fashion, gastronomy, and culture. It's home to iconic landmarks like the Eiffel Tower.

name: Santorini
description: Santorini is a Greek island famous for its whitewashed buildings, blue-domed churches, and stunning sunsets over the Aegean Sea.

name: Swiss Alps
description: The Swiss Alps are a mountain range known for breathtaking scenery, skiing resorts, and alpine villages.

name: Plitvice Lakes
description: Plitvice Lakes National Park in Croatia is renowned for its cascading lakes, waterfalls, and lush forests.

name: Tokyo
description: Tokyo, the capital of Japan, is a bustling metropolis blending ultramodern technology with traditional culture.

name: Bali
description: Bali is an Indonesian island known for its forested volcanic mountains, iconic rice paddies, beaches, and coral reefs.

name: Mount Everest
description: Mount Everest is the world's tallest mountain and a symbol of adventure and endurance.

name: Kaziranga National Park
description: Kaziranga National Park in India is a UNESCO World Heritage site known for its population of one-horned rhinoceroses.
